timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+name: Create Wappalyzer Update PR
+
+on:
+  push:
+    paths:
+      README.md
+  schedule:
+    - cron:  '0 4 3 * *'
+
+jobs:
+  create_pr:
+    name: Create Pull Request
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+    - name: Build Feature Branch and Raise PR
+      run: |
+        # Setup git details
+        export GITHUB_USER=zapbot
+        git config --global user.email "zapbot@zaproxy.org"

timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+name: Create Wappalyzer Update PR
+
+on:
+  push:
+    paths:
+      README.md
+  schedule:
+    - cron:  '0 4 3 * *'
+
+jobs:
+  create_pr:
+    name: Create Pull Request
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+    - name: Build Feature Branch and Raise PR
+      run: |
+        # Setup git details
+        export GITHUB_USER=zapbot
+        git config --global user.email "zapbot@zaproxy.org"
+        git config --global user.name $GITHUB_USER
+        # Clone repos
+        git clone https://github.com/AliasIO/wappalyzer.git

replies.bodyText: Was just suggesting for this repo, the one that will be pushed/PRed needs the whole history (at least the last time I tried push/PR GitHub didn't like the partial history).
replies.author: thc202

timeline.message:
Add Wappalyzer Updates Github Action

Versus the April 3rd run from the test repo this one uses different
github token, different git global config details, and further uses
$GITHUB_USER in various places (global config and URLs).

This job is setup to run 'At 04:00 on day-of-month 3.', per
https://help.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#onschedule
time is UTC.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

Add Wappalyzer Updates Github Action

Versus the April 3rd run from the test repo this one uses different
github token, different git global config details, and further uses
$GITHUB_USER in various places (global config and URLs), and
standardizes the permissions of icons before copying them.

This job is setup to run 'At 04:00 on day-of-month 3.', per
https://help.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#onschedule
time is UTC.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+name: Create Wappalyzer Update PR
+
+on:

replies.bodyText: Good catch, that's a leftover from the test repo. We don't need push included at all.
replies.author: kingthorin

timeline.message:
Add Wappalyzer Updates Github Action

Versus the April 3rd run from the test repo this one uses different
github token, different git global config details, and further uses
$GITHUB_USER in various places (global config and URLs), and
standardizes the permissions of icons before copying them, job runs only
on schedule.

This job is setup to run 'At 04:00 on day-of-month 3.', per
https://help.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#onschedule
time is UTC.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

standardizes the permissions of icons before copying them, job runs only

This job is setup to run 'At 04:00 on day-of-month 3.', per
https://help.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions#onschedule
time is UTC.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
